metadata.title: CVE-2024-30251 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: aiohttp is an asynchronous HTTP client/server framework for asyncio andPython. In affected versions an attacker can send a specially crafted POST(multipart/form-data) request. When the aiohttp server processes it, theserver will enter an infinite loop and be unable to process any furtherrequests. An attacker can stop the application from serving requests aftersending a single request. This issue has been addressed in version 3.9.4.Users are advised to upgrade. Users unable to upgrade may manually apply apatch to their systems. Please see the linked GHSA for instructions.

criterions.comment: python-aiohttp package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
